NORP The report stated that the police had received information according to which the ORG branch of the ORG was the organiser of the press statement to be held and MPs , mayors and local politicians from the ORG as well as members of a number of non - governmental organisations would gather in front of the ORG ’s ORG party office at TIME and march to FAC , where they would make a press statement . The police gave a warning to those people and asked them to disperse . The demonstrators refused to obey the warnings . As a result , the police had to use proportionate force against the group , who were holding an illegal demonstration . The police intervened using truncheons , water and tear gas . The police report also noted that some people had taken down the NORP flag in the schoolyard of the ORG nursery school .
